name: Crazy Car Crush Zombie
description:
Start with road full of blood and fire, Crazy Car Crush Zombie will take you into the escape journey of most madness and dangerous Zombies.
How to play:
- Move your car to dodge obstacles and defeat as many Zombies as possible
- Use rocket to destroy and crush everything else
- Advanced 3D graphics, smooth gameplay in all devices
- Best experience in Zombie world
